#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int ctr;
    int t;
    cin >> t;

    int digNum;
    int digSum;
    int ans;
    int n;
    int dummy;
    int lowerlimit;
    int i;

    bool hasEncore;

    for(ctr = 0; ctr < t; ctr++)
    {
        cin >> n;

        digSum = 0;
        digNum = 0;
        dummy = n;
        while(dummy != 0)
        {
            digNum++;
            dummy = dummy / 10;
        }

        lowerlimit = n - (9*digNum);
        hasEncore = false;

        for(i = lowerlimit; i < n; i++)
        {
            if(hasEncore)
            {
                break;
            }

            digSum = 0;
            dummy = i;
            while(dummy != 0)
            {
                digSum = digSum + dummy % 10;
                dummy = dummy / 10;
            }

            if(i + digSum == n)
            {
                hasEncore = true;
                ans = i;
            }
        }

        if(hasEncore)
            cout << ans << endl;
        else
            cout << "NONE" << endl;

    }

    return 0;
}
